ping: Dink! The ball knocks over **{bot_nick}**'s glass of lemonade.

118887220235993088: The peasants have forced **{0}** to rewrite the code for Weirwolf. After several hours of tedious coding, **{0}**, a **{1}** has been found dead after losing the will to live.

The village has voted to deal out the same punishment to **{0}** as Tiger's legend Manu Tuilagi dealt to Chris Ashton in the past. After several punches, **{0}** is brutalised to death revealing that he was a **{1}**.
The mob has voted to make **{0}** Leicester Head Coach. This is surely a sentence worse than death! His CV mentions that he was indeed a **{1}**.

The village has voted that **{0}** reliquish his role as moderator of r/sports and take on a more demanding position moderating r/incels and r/semenretention. Hours later, this **{1}** is found dead in mysterious circumstances!

The villagers have developed a great sense of irony after voting to lynch **{0}** by forcing him to wear a Saracens jersey and throwing him to an ambush of tigers. After several minutes, it's obvious that he was a **{1}**.
276463944779169793: The bastard english have ganged up on **{0}**, a noble Irish **{1}**.
Everyone decided to murder the most handsome **{1}** in the village, **{0}**.
The villagers have decided to copy Tana Umaga's infamous Lions-Tour-ending tackle on BOD, on **{0}**. After their first attempt, his neck is broken revealing him to be a **{1}**.
The angry mob has elected to drag **{0}**, a **{1}**, to TK Maxx where he is savagely murdered using affordable and designer brands of cooking knives.
The peasants have chopped up **{0}** and sold this **{1}** to Tesco as beef for their burger range.
347745786030718978: **{0}** emits one final "HONK!", before the rope snaps his neck. He was a **{1}**.
The villagers have developed a taste for **{0}**. He's torn limb from limb, and roasted over a big fire. Nobody seems to care that he was a **{1}**.

Before the villagers can grab **{0}**, he is a revealed to be not just a **{1}** but actually a goose in **{1}** clothing!. He attempts to fly away but in a cruel twist of fate hits into a wind turbine, dying instantly.
The populace have decided to kill **{0}**. Not only is he discovered to be a **{1}** after death, but also to have been co-owner of several shell companies with Nigel Wray.
The noose is placed around **{0}**'s neck and the trap door opens, killing the **{1}** instantly. Further inspection of the body clarifies that the mods are indeed Nazis.
The irate crowd has forced **{0}** to audit Saracens' accounts for the previous 20 seasons. This is surely worse than death for the **{1}**, who is forced to leave the village!
218102736246407169: The capitalist pigs finally caught comrade **{0}**, a **{1}**.
Dan Biggar waves his arms in the air and cries out in protest, but he couldn't stop the villagers from lynching **{0}**, a **{1}**
207225329578672128: As the noose is placed around **{1}** **{0}**'s neck, he mutters something to himself that sounds like "*...Nuremberg all over again...*".
The villagers have forced **{0}** to leave the village to join the Brexit Party and organise all their future marches. His new membership card reveals him to have been a **{1}**.
The mob has beaten **{0}** into a coma and sent him off to the IRFU's Exiles Irish Qualified Development Programme. Surely for this staunch Englishman and **{1}**, this is a fate worse than death.
The villagers attempt to lynch **{0}**, but before they can pin down the **{1}**, he gets poached by Bath and leaves forever.
604276140806373427: Driven by a dangerous wave of racial and ethnic tension, the villagers have lynched **{0}**, who was a **{1}**.
The mob has decided that **{0}** should watch every single ASM final loss. Several hours later, this **{1}** has been found dead with a broken heart.
The villagers have voted to guillotine **{0}**. After he's beheaded, a quick inspection of the body reveals that the **{1}** did indeed have chlamydia.
Les peasants electent mortir les meilleur personne Francais **{0}**. Il etait un **{1}**.
The angry crowd has forced **{0}** to change his disseration topic to 'References and Accounts of Chlamydia in Medieval France'. This **{1}** might as well be considered dead!
As the villagers are about to slit **{1}** **{0}**'s throat, Aurelien Rougerie appears out of nowhere and expertly convinces the crowd to let him personally carry out the execution by snoo snoo!
285548234472947713: Truly the greatest fears of the 1% have been fulfilled. The poor and destitute villagers have murdered Lord **{0}**, a **{1}**.
The angry mob has forced **{0}** to join the Saracens family legal team. After several long hours of a tedious legal scoping exercise with Nigel Wray, this **{1}** is found dead.
The village has forced **{0}** to go on a neverending pub crawl with Alex Goode. It is expected that this **{1}** will die of liver failure within the next few days.
In a streak of irony, the angry mob make **{0}** drink a concoction of every chemical compound mentioned in his PhD Thesis. After many agonising hours of screaming and pain, this **{1}** dies!
117523275571003393: The ignorant peasants of the village have voted to lynch **{0}**. Despite his rational and calm attempts to reason with the mob, this **{1}** is savagely cut down.
The villagers have voted to guillotine **{0}**. After he's beheaded, a quick inspection of the body reveals that he is actually not a ghost but a **{1}**.
The mob vote to re-enact their favourite Pro D2 red card highlights on **{0}**. After multiple punches and heavy blows to the head, this **{1}** dies!
In a particular francophobic turn of events, the angry villagers beat **{0}** to death with several stale baguettes. A quick search of the body, reveals that he was a **{1}**.
After the group votes to murder **{0}**, a **{1}**, it is revealed that 'le fantom' is actually nothing more than a figment of their collective madness as he fades from their memories.
The crowd has voted to sentence **{0}** to death. This is carried out by signing this **{1}** up to Racing 92's fanclub. As we know this is a fate worse than death.
252394382425194496: The angry mob has lynched **{0}**, a **{1}**. In a vicious streak of sectarian irony, he's forced to march around the village 1690 times until he dies of exhaustion!
The irate crowd has voted to lynch **{0}**. After several powerful blows with a sledgehammer to the body, this **{1}** dies!

The group ties **{0}** to the communal nuclear submarine which is ordered to dive to the crushing depths of the continential shelf. Several hours later, the body of this **{1}** washes up on the shore.
The villagers have forced **{0}** to join the Flags and Parades Commission in Northern Ireland. Surely for this **{1}**, this is a fate worse than death!
The peasants vote to re-enact the Stephen Ferris' biggest hits montage from Youtube on **{0}**. After several powerful blows to the body and head, this **{1}** dies!
The villagers have voted to lynch **{0}**, a **{1}**. He's fired out of a cannon called "Roaring Meg" from the village museum, used in the Siege of Derry or Londonderry.
